atk-s0517a10:2_1: Idāni tesaṁ tiṇṇaṁ vipallāsānaṁ pahānakaraṁ ariyamaggaṁ dassentena kathitāya maggakathāya apubbatthānuvaṇṇanā.
atk-s0517a10:2_2: Tattha maggoti kenaṭṭhena maggoti yo buddhasāsane maggoti vuccati,
atk-s0517a10:2_3: so kenaṭṭhena maggo nāma hotīti attho.
atk-s0517a10:2_4: Micchādiṭṭhiyā pahānāyātiādīsu dasasu pariyāyesu paṭhamo paṭhamo tassa tassa maggaṅgassa ujuvipaccanīkavasena vutto.
atk-s0517a10:2_5: Maggo ceva hetu cāti tassa tassa kiccassa karaṇāya paṭipadaṭṭhena maggo,
atk-s0517a10:2_7: Tena maggassa paṭipadaṭṭho sampāpakaṭṭho ca vutto hoti.
atk-s0517a10:2_12: Evaṁ dvīhi dvīhi padehi ‘‘maggoti kenaṭṭhena maggo’’ti pucchāya vissajjanaṁ kataṁ hoti.
atk-s0517a10:2_13: Sahajātānaṁ dhammānaṁ upatthambhanāyāti attanā sahajātānaṁ arūpadhammānaṁ sahajātaaññamaññanissayādibhāvena upatthambhanabhāvāya.
atk-s0517a10:2_15: Paṭivedhādivisodhanāyāti ettha yasmā ‘‘ko cādi kusalānaṁ dhammānaṁ,
atk-s0517a10:2_16: sīlañca suvisuddhaṁ diṭṭhi ca ujukā’’ti (saṁ. ni. 5.369,
atk-s0517a10:2_17: 381) vacanato sīlañca diṭṭhi ca saccapaṭivedhassa ādi.
atk-s0517a10:2_24: Saccābhisamayāyāti catunnaṁ saccānaṁ ekābhisamayāya kiccanipphattivasena ekapaṭivedhāya.
atk-s0517a10:2_25: Nirodhe patiṭṭhāpanāyāti cittassa vā puggalassa vā nibbāne patiṭṭhāpanatthāya.
atk-s0517a10:2_26: Sakadāgāmimaggakkhaṇādīsu aṭṭha maggaṅgāni ekato katvā taṁtaṁmaggavajjhakilesappahānaṁ vuttaṁ.
atk-s0517a10:2_28: Yasmā uparūparimaggenāpi suṭṭhu ādivisodhanā suṭṭhu cittavodānañca hoti,
atk-s0517a10:3_0: Dassanamaggotiādīhi yāva pariyosānā tassa dhammassa lakkhaṇavasena maggaṭṭho vutto.
atk-s0517a10:3_3: Hetuṭṭhena maggoti ca aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo niddiṭṭho.
atk-s0517a10:3_5: Ādhipateyyaṭṭhena indriyāti ādīni ca indriyādīnaṁ atthavasena vuttāni,
atk-s0517a10:3_8: Sabbepi te dhammā nibbānassa paṭipadaṭṭhena maggo.
atk-s0517a10:3_9: Ante vuttaṁ nibbānaṁ pana saṁsāradukkhābhibhūtehi dukkhanissaraṇatthikehi sappurisehi maggīyati gavesīyatīti maggoti vuttanti veditabbanti.
